titleInfo.title: 'Travels from India to England : comprehending a visit to the Burman Empire, and a journey through Persia, Asia Minor, European Turkey, &c., in the years 1825-26, by James Edward Alexander'

physicalDescription.extent: There is a table of content at the beginning of the volume, detailing the arrangement of contents and page references and illustrations (pages xi-xvi).
Dimensions: 270 mm x 220 mm.Pagination: initial Roman numeral pagination (i-xv); (1-301).

mods.abstract: Travels from India to England : comprehending a visit to the Burman Empire, and a journey through Persia, Asia Minor, European Turkey, &c., in the years 1825-26, by James Edward Alexander.Publication Details: London : Parbury, Allen & Co., 1827.Ownership: With stamps of the India Office Library.There are numerous illustrations, maps and plates.
